description:
Beginner at art? This course will teach you basic information where you can create with ease. Chalk pastels are easy and fun. Let's create two seaside scenes using only chalk pastels.

-Taking this course will teach you the basics of working with pastels.

- In less than an hour you can complete two projects that you will love in a step-by-step style.

-This course is designed for the beginner to achieve success.

-You will learn at least two techniques per project.

-You will learn how to choose the materials for the projects.

-This course is done in a step-by-step process.

-You will learn to love the ease with which you can create an art project.
title: Chalk Pastels for Beginners 1
